CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Search Transport Options stage positioned above or below the Select Carrier or Service stage?
SRP.A: The Search Transport Options stage is positioned {above} the Select Carrier or Service stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Book Transport Service?
VE.A: The value of stage Book Transport Service is {867}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Select Carrier or Service?
VE.A: The value of stage Select Carrier or Service is {1516}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Search Transport Options?
VE.A: The value of stage Search Transport Options is {2203}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Search Transport Options, with a value of {2203}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Prepare for Pickup, with a value of {315}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Book Transport Service to stage Prepare for Pickup?
SC.A: Decreased by {552} Thousand Shipments from stage Book Transport Service to stage Prepare for Pickup.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Select Carrier or Service to stage Book Transport Service?
SC.A: Decreased by {649} Thousand Shipments from stage Select Carrier or Service to stage Book Transport Service.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 591? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Search Transport Options} stage has {2203}, the {Select Carrier or Service} stage has {1516}, the {Book Transport Service} stage has {867}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 1191? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Book Transport Service} stage has {867}, the {Prepare for Pickup} stage has {315}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 591 and 1859? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Select Carrier or Service} stage has {1516}, the {Book Transport Service} stage has {867}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Select Carrier or Service to Book Transport Service, or from stage Book Transport Service to Prepare for Pickup?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Select Carrier or Service} to {Book Transport Service} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Book Transport Service to Prepare for Pickup, from stage Search Transport Options to Select Carrier or Service, or from stage Select Carrier or Service to Book Transport Service?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Search Transport Options} to stage {Select Carrier or Service} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Search Transport Options} and {Select Carrier or Service} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Book Transport Service} and {Prepare for Pickup} stages.
